Translations.Text: When they see it brought near, the countenances of the faithless will be distorted, and [they will be] told, ‘This is what you asked for!’
Say, ‘Tell me, whether Allah destroys me and those with me, or He has mercy on us, who will shelter the faithless from a painful punishment?’
Say, ‘He is the All-beneficent; we have faith in Him, and in Him do we trust. Soon you will know who is in manifest error.’
Say, ‘Tell me, should your water sink down [into the ground], who will bring you running water?’
Nun. By the Pen and what they write
you are not, by your Lord’s blessing, crazy
and yours indeed will be an everlasting reward
and indeed you possess a great character
You will see and they will see
which one of you is crazy
Indeed your Lord knows best those who stray from His way, and He knows best those who are guided
So do not obey the deniers
who are eager that you should be pliable, so that they may be pliable [towards you]
And do not obey any vile swearer
hinderer of all good, sinful transgressor
callous and, on top of that, baseborn
—[only] because he has wealth and children
When Our signs are recited to him, he says, ‘Myths of the ancients!’
